job.command:
cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' if (! $?) then set evtsFile = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` else set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set f = 1 set l = 5000000 endif echo "${evtsFile}" setenv STARFPE NO
set filel = `basename $evtsFile .daq` set output = ${filel}.event.root if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set logFile = ${filel}B.log if ( -r $logFile) exit 0; set muFile = ${filel}.MuDst.root if (-r $muFile) exit 0; root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C('${f}','${l}',"RC.y2010,StiCA,KFVertex,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco","'${evtsFile}'","'$output'")' >& ${logFile}
